p: It is important to highlight that the reduced vulnerability values observed for the municipalities in the central region of the state, as well as for the Madeira microregion, does not mean that these territories do not require actions to enhance their adaptive capacity and resilience. Thus, for microregions that have municipalities in the central parts of the state–Coari, Tefé, Japurá and Juruá –investment is essential to reduce poverty together with the improvement of socio-political articulations, since the climatic aspect was not decisive in determining the vulnerability of these human populations to the climate change.
